text: The Addams Family is a 2019 animated supernatural black comedy movie directed by Conrad Vernon and Greg Tiernan. It is based on the characters created by Charles Addams. The movie stars the voices of Oscar Isaac, Charlize Theron, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Finn Wolfhard, Nick Kroll, Snoop Dogg, Bette Midler, and Allison Janney. The movie was released on October 11, 2019 to mixed reviews. ==References== Category:The Addams Family Category:2019 animated movies Category:2019 comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:American computer-animated movies Category:American 3D animated movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:Halloween movies Category:Movies directed by Conrad Vernon Category:Movies directed by Greg Tiernan
title: The Addams Family (2019 movie)
